Game of Trons

Once upon a time, there was a blockchain kingdom full of infinite treasures. Legend has it that only one
true king could claim the Tron to the kingdom and marvel in its wealth. Since then, cryptonauts from
all over the world have tried to claim the right to the kingdom's treasure. But to this day the Tron
remains empty, waiting for it's rightful king to rise.

Will YOU be the last one to sit on the Tron, be crowned king and win the treasure ?

Or will you invest in land and collect taxes from other players that attempt to become your king ?


Current Kingdom Treasure : TRX 20 000

DDFxdVvrf1254fhgt54f - WILL BE KING IN :
I will be the king!

My Land :

I own 00000 lands

I earn 00000 Trx from taxes

Withdraw your part of the 20% from treasure here : 000 Trx

Get More Lands :

Current tron : Paper Tron - Price to buy a land : 10Trx

Unlock your Tronlink to access the game - www.tronlink.org

Mining transaction…

To sit on the Tron and claim your right to the kingdom: Expand the kingdom by adding new land to it.

When the countdown ends : the suitor sitting on the Tron at that time will become king and win 80% of the kingdom's treasure. The other 20% of the treasure will be split between all existing land owners in the kingdom.

If someone else expands the kingdom before you can become king. You will become a land owner and he’ll be the one to sit on the Tron. And so on until a new king rises.

Each land you own in the kingdom gives you the right to claim a part of each new suitor's contribution.

A 50% tax on each new purchased land is split equally between all existing land owners.

As a land owner you can withdraw your tax earnings whenever you want, even if no king has been chosen yet.
Your lands will always remain yours and you will keep getting tax earnings until a new king is crowned.

You can buy multiple lands at once to become a huge land owner and make money with tax earnings on the back of future suitor.

Each time the kingdom's treasure reaches a certain size, the Tron changes it's value.
The countdown reduces but the land price increases.

How To Play

In order to play you need some TRX + TRONLINK plugin installed. Follow the step bellow if you need help.

Grab some tron



Unlock Tronlink



Buy a land



Game is on


about the game

All game rules are managed by a non modifiable and verified smart contract. >> Link HERE Code is the only law out there.

Everytime a king is crowned, a new game of Trons begins. To start a new game of Trons, one player just needs to buy land in the new kingdom. All winnings are available to withdraw and will stay in the contract until the owner withdraws them. Your lands in the previous game of Trons won't count in the new one.

All earnings are locked in the contract with your betting address; do not lose access to your address; it is the only way the contract can identify you.

If no king has been chosen and the kingdom's treasure reaches 19 999 999 600, the last player to sit on the Tron will win. Treasure can't go over 20B Trx.

If your attempt to claim the Tron doesn't work, there is no guaranteed return: your tax earnings depend on how much players buy lands after you.
